original_text: But he took his stand in the midst of the plot and defended it and struck down the Philistines, and the Lord worked a great victory.
korean_text: 그는 그 밭 가운데 서서 막아 블레셋 사람들을 친지라 여호와께서 큰 구원을 이루시니라

sentences.original_text: But he took his stand in the midst of the plot
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 밭 한가운데서 버티고 서서

sentences.original_text: and the Lord worked a great victory
